Name: UC KART
About the game: UC KART is a racing game for 1 to 4 players. There is HP in the car. When HP reaches zero, the game is over. Equipped with color edit function You can change the color of the car and the driver. Single play support You can play against the CPU. Online play support You can play against other players online. Controls 【Keyboard】 UP:w,↑ DOWN:s,↓ LEFT:a,← RIGHT:d,→ ACCEL:j,v BRAKE&BACK:k,c PAUSE:Escape 【PS4 Controller】 UP:Left Stick DOWN:Left Stick LEFT:Left Stick RIGHT:Left Stick ACCEL:〇 BRAKE&BACK:× PAUSE:option 【XBox Controller】 UP:Left Stick DOWN:Left Stick LEFT:Left Stick RIGHT:Left Stick ACCEL:B BRAKE&BACK:A PAUSE:menu
